Interface DataAccessInterface<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of entity this interface handles
All Known Subinterfaces:
ProductDAO
All Known Implementing Classes:
ProductDAOImpl, UserDAOImpl
public interface DataAccessInterface<T>
Generic interface for data access operations

      T findById(int id)
      Finds an entity by its ID
      Parameters:
      id - the ID to search for
      Returns:
      the found entity or null if not found

      T findByUsername(String username)
      Finds an entity by username
      Parameters:

      Returns:
